verbose_text: The mechanisms accountable for renal tubular dysfunction encompass uncoupling of mitochondrial phosphorylation by bilirubin and oxidative injury of tubular cell membranes together with suppression of apical Na + / H + exchanger and basolateral Na + / K + -ATPase activity in the tubular cell membranes by bile acids 3, 16.
evidence: bilirubin and oxidative injury of tubular cell membranes together with suppression of apical Na
